body_html: Hi all, I have submitted a change that adds TF_AddGradients to the c api. Note the gradient functions are registered in tensorflow/cc/gradients, so they will need to be included to use the gradients. Let me know if you run into any issues. Thanks!

body: Hi all, I have submitted a change that adds TF_AddGradients to the c api. Note the gradient functions are registered in tensorflow/cc/gradients, so they will need to be included to use the gradients. Let me know if you run into any issues. Thanks!
